description: This table contains service line information for claim reconciliation records.

columns.name: CLAIM_REC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the claim, in external format.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date of the claim, in internal format.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count of line level procedure codes for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_PROC_CODE
columns.description: The line level procedure codes for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_AMT_SUBMT
columns.description: The line level amount submitted by the payer for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_AMT_PAID
columns.description: The line level amount paid by the payer for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_STAT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The line level status code for this claim reconciliation record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unmapped code received

columns.name: LINE_STATUS_MSG
columns.description: The line level textual status message for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_STAT_CAT_COD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The line level status category code for this claim reconciliation record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unmapped code received

columns.name: LN_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: Stores the American National Standards Institute (ANSI) line item control number for this claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: LINE_PROC_MODS
columns.description: Procedure modifiers associated with the line specified in the information request.

columns.name: LINE_REV_CODE
columns.description: Revenue code associated with the line specified in the information request.

columns.name: LINE_TOOTH_CODE
columns.description: Tooth code associated with the line specified in the information request.

columns.name: LINE_TOOTH_SURFACES
columns.description: Tooth surface codes associated with the line specified in the information request.
